00025 #include "IMB_indexer.h"
00026 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00027 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"
00028 #include <time.h>

00030 typedef struct indexer_dv_bitstream {
00031     unsigned char* buffer;
00032     int bit_pos;
00033 } indexer_dv_bitstream;
00034 
00035 static indexer_dv_bitstream bitstream_new(unsigned char* buffer_) 
00036 {
00037     indexer_dv_bitstream rv;
00038 
00039     rv.buffer = buffer_;
00040     rv.bit_pos = 0;
00041 
00042     return rv;
00043 }
00044 
00045 static unsigned long bitstream_get_bits(indexer_dv_bitstream * This, int num) 
00046 {
00047     int byte_pos = This->bit_pos >> 3;
00048     unsigned long i = 
00049         This->buffer[byte_pos] | (This->buffer[byte_pos + 1] << 8) |
00050         (This->buffer[byte_pos + 2] << 16) | 
00051         (This->buffer[byte_pos + 3] << 24);
00052     int rval = (i >> (This->bit_pos & 0x7)) & ((1 << num) - 1);
00053     This->bit_pos += num;
00054     return rval;
00055 }
00056 
00057 static int parse_num(indexer_dv_bitstream * b, int numbits)
00058 {
00059     return bitstream_get_bits(b, numbits);
00060 }
00061 
00062 static int parse_bcd(indexer_dv_bitstream * b, int n) 
00063 {
00064     char s[256];
00065     char * p = s + (n+3)/4;
00066 
00067     *p-- = 0;
00068 
00069     while (n > 4) {
00070         char a;
00071         int v = bitstream_get_bits(b, 4);
00072 
00073         n -= 4;
00074         a = '0' + v;
00075 
00076         if (a > '9') {
00077             bitstream_get_bits(b, n);
00078             return -1;
00079         }
00080 
00081         *p-- = a;
00082     }
00083     if (n) {
00084         char a;
00085         int v = bitstream_get_bits(b, n);
00086         a = '0' + v;
00087         if (a > '9') {
00088             return -1;
00089         }
00090         *p-- = a;
00091     }
00092 
00093     return atol(s);
00094 }

00096 typedef struct indexer_dv_context
00097 {
00098     int rec_curr_frame;
00099     int rec_curr_second;
00100     int rec_curr_minute;
00101     int rec_curr_hour;
00102 
00103     int rec_curr_day;
00104     int rec_curr_month;
00105     int rec_curr_year;
00106 
00107     char got_record_date;
00108     char got_record_time;
00109 
00110     time_t ref_time_read;
00111     time_t ref_time_read_new;
00112     int curr_frame;
00113 
00114     time_t gap_start;
00115     int gap_frame;
00116 
00117     int frameno_offset;
00118 
00119     anim_index_entry backbuffer[31];
00120     int fsize;
00121 
00122     anim_index_builder * idx;
00123 } indexer_dv_context;
00124 
00125 static void parse_packet(indexer_dv_context * This, unsigned char * p)
00126 {
00127     indexer_dv_bitstream b;
00128     int type = p[0];
00129 
00130     b = bitstream_new(p + 1);
00131 
00132     switch (type) {
00133         case 0x62: // Record date
00134             parse_num(&b, 8);
00135             This->rec_curr_day = parse_bcd(&b, 6);
00136             parse_num(&b, 2);
00137             This->rec_curr_month = parse_bcd(&b, 5);
00138             parse_num(&b, 3);
00139             This->rec_curr_year = parse_bcd(&b, 8);
00140             if (This->rec_curr_year < 25) {
00141                 This->rec_curr_year += 2000;
00142             }
00143             else {
00144                 This->rec_curr_year += 1900;
00145             }
00146             This->got_record_date = 1;
00147             break;
00148         case 0x63: // Record time
00149             This->rec_curr_frame = parse_bcd(&b, 6);
00150             parse_num(&b, 2);
00151             This->rec_curr_second = parse_bcd(&b, 7);
00152             parse_num(&b, 1);
00153             This->rec_curr_minute = parse_bcd(&b, 7);
00154             parse_num(&b, 1);
00155             This->rec_curr_hour = parse_bcd(&b, 6);
00156             This->got_record_time = 1;
00157             break;
00158     }
00159 }
00160 
00161 static void parse_header_block(indexer_dv_context * This, unsigned char* target)
00162 {
00163     int i;
00164     for (i = 3; i < 80; i += 5) {
00165         if (target[i] != 0xff) {
00166             parse_packet(This, target + i);
00167         }
00168     }
00169 }
00170 
00171 static void parse_subcode_blocks(
00172         indexer_dv_context * This, unsigned char* target)
00173 {
00174     int i,j;
00175 
00176     for (j = 0; j < 2; j++) {
00177         for (i = 3; i < 80; i += 5) {
00178             if (target[i] != 0xff) {
00179                 parse_packet(This, target + i);
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 static void parse_vaux_blocks(
00186         indexer_dv_context * This, unsigned char* target)
00187 {
00188     int i,j;
00189 
00190     for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00191         for (i = 3; i < 80; i += 5) {
00192             if (target[i] != 0xff) {
00193                 parse_packet(This, target + i);
00194             }
00195         }
00196         target += 80;
00197     }
00198 }
00199 
00200 static void parse_audio_headers(
00201         indexer_dv_context * This, unsigned char* target)
00202 {
00203     int i;
00204 
00205     for (i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
00206         if (target[3] != 0xff) {
00207             parse_packet(This, target + 3);
00208         }
00209         target += 16 * 80;
00210     }
00211 }
00212 
00213 static void parse_frame(indexer_dv_context * This, 
00214                         unsigned char * framebuffer, int isPAL)
00215 {
00216     int numDIFseq = isPAL ? 12 : 10;
00217     unsigned char* target = framebuffer;
00218     int ds;
00219 
00220     for (ds = 0; ds < numDIFseq; ds++) {
00221         parse_header_block(This, target);
00222         target +=   1 * 80;
00223         parse_subcode_blocks(This, target);
00224         target +=   2 * 80;
00225         parse_vaux_blocks(This, target);
00226         target +=   3 * 80;
00227         parse_audio_headers(This, target);
00228         target += 144 * 80;
00229     }
00230 }
00231 
00232 static void inc_frame(int * frame, time_t * t, int isPAL)
00233 {
00234     if ((isPAL && *frame >= 25) || (!isPAL && *frame >= 30)) {
00235         fprintf(stderr, "Ouchie: inc_frame: invalid_frameno: %d\n",
00236                 *frame);
00237     }
00238     (*frame)++;
00239     if (isPAL && *frame >= 25) {
00240         (*t)++;
00241         *frame = 0;
00242     }
00243     else if (!isPAL && *frame >= 30) {
00244         (*t)++;
00245         *frame = 0;
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 static void write_index(indexer_dv_context * This, anim_index_entry * entry)
00250 {
00251     IMB_index_builder_add_entry(
00252         This->idx, entry->frameno + This->frameno_offset, 
00253         entry->seek_pos, entry->seek_pos_dts, entry->pts);
00254 }
00255 
00256 static void fill_gap(indexer_dv_context * This, int isPAL)
00257 {
00258     int i;
00259 
00260     for (i = 0; i < This->fsize; i++) {
00261         if (This->gap_start == This->ref_time_read &&
00262                 This->gap_frame == This->curr_frame) {
00263             fprintf(stderr,
00264                     "indexer_dv::fill_gap: "
00265                     "can't seek backwards !\n");
00266             break;
00267         }
00268         inc_frame(&This->gap_frame, &This->gap_start, isPAL);
00269     }
00270 
00271     while (This->gap_start != This->ref_time_read ||
00272            This->gap_frame != This->curr_frame) {
00273         inc_frame(&This->gap_frame, &This->gap_start, isPAL);
00274         This->frameno_offset++;
00275     }
00276 
00277     for (i = 0; i < This->fsize; i++) {
00278         write_index(This, This->backbuffer + i);
00279     }
00280     This->fsize = 0;
00281 }
00282 
00283 static void proc_frame(indexer_dv_context * This,
00284                        unsigned char* UNUSED(framebuffer), int isPAL)
00285 {
00286     struct tm recDate;
00287     time_t t;
00288 
00289     if (!This->got_record_date || !This->got_record_time) {
00290         return;
00291     }
00292 
00293     recDate.tm_sec = This->rec_curr_second;
00294     recDate.tm_min = This->rec_curr_minute;
00295     recDate.tm_hour = This->rec_curr_hour;
00296     recDate.tm_mday = This->rec_curr_day;
00297     recDate.tm_mon = This->rec_curr_month - 1;
00298     recDate.tm_year = This->rec_curr_year - 1900;
00299     recDate.tm_wday = -1;
00300     recDate.tm_yday = -1;
00301     recDate.tm_isdst = -1;
00302     
00303     t = mktime(&recDate);
00304     if (t == -1) {
00305         return;
00306     }
00307 
00308     This->ref_time_read_new = t;
00309 
00310     if (This->ref_time_read < 0) {
00311         This->ref_time_read = This->ref_time_read_new;
00312         This->curr_frame = 0;
00313     }
00314     else {
00315         if (This->ref_time_read_new - This->ref_time_read == 1) {
00316             This->curr_frame = 0;
00317             This->ref_time_read = This->ref_time_read_new;
00318             if (This->gap_frame >= 0) {
00319                 fill_gap(This, isPAL);
00320                 This->gap_frame = -1;
00321             }
00322         }
00323         else if (This->ref_time_read_new  == This->ref_time_read) {
00324             // do nothing
00325         }
00326         else {
00327             This->gap_start = This->ref_time_read;
00328             This->gap_frame = This->curr_frame;
00329             This->ref_time_read = This->ref_time_read_new;
00330             This->curr_frame = -1;
00331         }
00332     }
00333 }
00334 
00335 static void indexer_dv_proc_frame(anim_index_builder * idx, 
00336                                   unsigned char * buffer,
00337                                   int UNUSED(data_size),
00338                                   struct anim_index_entry * entry)
00339 {
00340     int isPAL;
00341     
00342     indexer_dv_context * This = (indexer_dv_context *) idx->private_data;
00343 
00344     isPAL = (buffer[3] & 0x80);
00345 
00346     This->got_record_date = FALSE;
00347     This->got_record_time = FALSE;
00348 
00349     parse_frame(This, buffer, isPAL);
00350     proc_frame(This, buffer, isPAL);
00351 
00352     if (This->curr_frame >= 0) {
00353         write_index(This, entry);
00354         inc_frame(&This->curr_frame, &This->ref_time_read, isPAL);
00355     }
00356     else {
00357         This->backbuffer[This->fsize++] = *entry;
00358         if (This->fsize >= 31) {
00359             int i;
00360 
00361             fprintf(stderr, "indexer_dv::indexer_dv_proc_frame: "
00362                     "backbuffer overrun, emergency flush");
00363 
00364             for (i = 0; i < This->fsize; i++) {
00365                 write_index(This, This->backbuffer+i);
00366             }
00367             This->fsize = 0;
00368         }
00369     }
00370 }
00371 
00372 static void indexer_dv_delete(anim_index_builder * idx)
00373 {
00374     int i = 0;
00375     indexer_dv_context * This = (indexer_dv_context *) idx->private_data;
00376 
00377     for (i = 0; i < This->fsize; i++) {
00378         write_index(This, This->backbuffer+i);
00379     }
00380 
00381     MEM_freeN(This);
00382 }
00383 
00384 void IMB_indexer_dv_new(anim_index_builder * idx)
00385 {
00386     indexer_dv_context * rv = MEM_callocN(
00387                 sizeof(indexer_dv_context), "index_dv builder context");
00388 
00389     rv->ref_time_read = -1;
00390     rv->curr_frame = -1;
00391     rv->gap_frame = -1;
00392     rv->idx = idx;
00393     
00394     idx->private_data = rv;
00395     idx->proc_frame = indexer_dv_proc_frame;
00396     idx->delete_priv_data = indexer_dv_delete;
00397 }
